name: GiftsForSomeoneYouHate
0:
”Alexa, ask Gift Buddy to give me a gift”
”Alexa, ask Gift Buddy to tell me a gift”
”Alexa, ask Gift Buddy for a gift”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gift buddy
des:
Got a friend that's not quite living up to your expectations? Need help coming up with gift ideas? Well, this skill is for you! Gifts For Someone You Hate is a fun skill that provides entertainment for friends, families, and parties. Get ideas for the worst possible gifts, all available for purchase on Amazon!

Coming Soon: Ask Alexa to judge exactly what someone deserves... "Lewis deserves a jar of nothing!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
